Class SideFrontRes

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am07.model.game.side.Side
it.polimi.ingsw.am07.model.game.side.SideFront
it.polimi.ingsw.am07.model.game.side.SideFrontRes
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class SideFrontRes extends SideFront
Represents the front side of a resource card. Has a static associated score.
